member.name: T:SkroutzLastMileClient.CreateShippingOrderRequestModel
member.summary: Request model used for creating a shipping order

member.name: P:SkroutzLastMileClient.CreateShippingOrderRequestModel.CustomerReference
member.summary: The customer reference (Your internal unique identifier of the order)

member.name: P:SkroutzLastMileClient.CreateShippingOrderRequestModel.IsReturn
member.summary: Indicates if the shipment is a return (Always use false)

member.name: P:SkroutzLastMileClient.CreateShippingOrderRequestModel.NumberOfParcels
member.summary: The number of parcels (Always use 1. Multiple-package orders are not supported for locker deliveries.)

member.name: P:SkroutzLastMileClient.CreateShippingOrderRequestModel.PickupLocationCode
member.summary: The unique code for the pickup location. It corresponds to a pre-agreed location for picking up parcels. A merchant can have multiple pickup location codes where each one corresponds to a different pickup location.

member.name: P:SkroutzLastMileClient.CreateShippingOrderRequestModel.PickupNotes
member.summary: Any additional notes for the pickup.

member.summary: The full name of the recipient

member.summary: The mobile phone number of the recipient

member.name: P:SkroutzLastMileClient.CreateShippingOrderRequestModel.SenderPhone
member.summary: The phone number of the merchant

member.name: P:SkroutzLastMileClient.CreateShippingOrderRequestModel.SkroutzPointId
member.summary: The Id of the chosen Skroutz Point locker from the map

member.name: P:SkroutzLastMileClient.CreateShippingOrderRequestModel.Weight
member.summary: The weight of the parcel

member.summary: Default constructor
